html:
1.24.18  7:02 pm   Do you think titling your pieces adds to their worth?

     second prize is to come up with a title that doesn't make it worse. first prize would be a title that makes it better

1.24.18  6:52 pm   I'm going to ask out a girl with your newest song, any ideas?

     i'm not sure how that would work

1.24.18  6:50 pm   Would you like to say a few words?

     i've already said way more than that

1.24.18  6:37 pm   what are you working on now ?

     a video

1.24.18  6:37 pm   do you run the youtube channel and make all the content on your own,

     yes, and more

     if so then understandable why it takes time due to all the musical theory and editing that must go into them

1.24.18  6:22 pm   on 1.23.18 you broke the age old tradition of answering all your questions in lowercase.

     that's not true, i use capital letters all the time, probably every day. where have you been

     was this intentional?

1.24.18  6:08 pm   Bill thank you so much for putting the song on Spotify. I'm sorry I asked you so much back you when you released it.

     it had already been sent at that time. the songs are always supposed to be there when the video comes out. but unfortunately i spelled it wrong the first time, which screwed up the whole system

      PS. Thank you so much for doing what you do

1.24.18  6:01 pm   If you could have a super power what would it be?

     being normal

1.24.18  5:46 pm   you forgot Canada in the history of the world video! XD

     you forgot that it's not possible to mention everything in the entire world in 20 minutes, and you also forgot all the other things i didn't mention

1.24.18  5:19 pm   are there any concepts youve been obsessed with lately?

     doing more better work in a shorter amount of time

     ive been going crazy over grand openings and opening ceremonies

1.24.18  4:51 pm   is dave brubeck the only one who knows what jazz is, will be and could possibly be? 

     no

1.24.18  4:50 pm   Why do you have a website

     why don't you

1.24.18  4:26 pm   have you ever eaten paper

     no

1.24.18  4:25 pm   Are you really a musician?

     i will check

1.24.18  3:56 pm   I just discover you and find you quite perfect. Why some extraterrestrial life didn't appear to us yet ?

     be patient, we've only been here like 5 minutes

1.24.18  3:51 pm   i asked a question but i forgot which one it was, do you remember it

     yes

1.24.18  3:28 pm   please just tell me what's the brand and model of microphone you use 

     i prefer not to mention brands without a sponsorship deal in place. but it's the one that most people use on stage

1.24.18  3:27 pm   why do you use different date formats in different places?  YYYY-MM-DD is always the best choice

     that one alphabetizes better, so it's better for file names. but i don't think it's what most people are used to seeing, visually

1.24.18  3:24 pm   the way you write the date is wrong (its 24/1/18 NOT 1/24/18)

     it is wrong in some countries, and right in others

1.24.18  3:20 pm   When you put a band together can I audition? I'm a real good drummer and I like to play groovy beats

     i'm looking for someone who likes to play songs

1.24.18  2:50 pm   what kind of music do you play?

     any

1.24.18  2:45 pm   What do you think about unusual metres in music? (like 5/4 or 7/8)

     they are quite common for 1-time occurences, transitions, etc. less comman to keep the entire song in a non-4 or non-3 meter. but it can happen

      Did you use them in any of your songs?

     sure

      Do you plan to?

     it's not something i think is best planned on. i just write the music the way it needs to be

      Do you consider the concept of musical metres to be too arbitrary and made-up and you just do music without giving it much thought, just making what sounds good?

     always do what sounds good. also good to understand time signatures if you want to chart out your music for other players

1.24.18  2:24 pm   if you could make a country what would it be called? 

     it depends where it is

1.24.18  2:18 pm   What's the point ?

     see how many points you can get

1.24.18  2:07 pm   What's a word or phrase that was said a lot in the past but isn't used much today?

     swag

1.24.18  1:44 pm   Microsoft Word put a red squiggly line under my name. Is this an appropriate time to have an identity crisis?

     no, it's time to use a program that accepts your name as correct

1.24.18  1:38 pm   how do you feel about fire extinguishers? personally i am appalled they have the right to extinguish a poor fire at will

     it's to stop the fire from extinguishing other things

1.24.18  1:21 pm   What's the mall verse in la de da about? 

     rejection, innovation, and exploration

1.24.18  1:16 pm   Do you think that one song by timbaland that goes 'it's too late to apologize' was written in response to that 'is it too late now to say sorry' song by bieber?

     no, that would be impossible because 'too late to apologize' was written about 10 years earlier. also it's a ryan tedder song, but it was re-mixed by timbaland

1.24.18  12:58 pm   What's the point of synonyms? Shouldn't there just be one word per thing? 

     words are like people

1.24.18  12:42 pm   how do i accomplish unaccomplishable accomplishments?

     go into settings, change them from unaccomplishable to accomplishable, and then accomplish them

1.24.18  12:40 pm   Do you feel an urge to procreate with chickens?

     not usually

1.24.18  12:32 pm   tips on improving vocals

     do it more, relax, drink water, take breaks, and enjoy yourself

1.24.18  12:19 pm   Crunchy or creamy peanut butter?

     it should say on the label

1.24.18  11:57 am   what day is it?

     i have it written down somewhere

1.24.18  11:02 am   what is better yahoo answers or the google developer forums

     that sounds like a question for yahoo answers, or the google developer forums

1.24.18  10:32 am   But honestly, how can you be so chill and cool? 

     each time i get burnt, i get a little better at avoiding it

1.24.18  10:29 am   do you have advice on making it as an artist/musician/performer? as a recent college grad with a pointless art degree I'm finding it hard to be motivated and confident about my work

     are you sure this is what you want to do

1.24.18  10:19 am   thoughts on breathing

     thoughts is breathing

1.24.18  9:02 am   Who Am I ? ,

     i don't know

      And Why I'm On Earth?

     to see what it's like

1.24.18  8:31 am   what will u do on ur yuotubes 400th video?

     i have already done at least 400 but some were removed

1.24.18  7:57 am   what is yuor opinion on poetry,

     it's good

      do you think it's an important art form?

     sure, especially when words are all you have

1.24.18  7:47 am   Please post more videos, I love to use them as reactions for my friends

     i post all the videos i make, and i make them all the time

1.24.18  7:34 am   how do you find out what you want to do ? it may be obvious but i can't seem to

     try different things and see which ones you like more

1.24.18  7:23 am   Is there a solution to everything?

     sometimes the thing is the solution

1.24.18  5:58 am   can everyone have interesting music ideas ?

     sure

1.24.18  5:55 am   why do silent letters exist

     because they used to be pronounced and the spelling hasn't been updated

1.24.18  3:59 am   How do you construct your chord sequences? They are so intricate and interesting. 

     i use my imagination

1.24.18  3:19 am   whats your stance on parallel parking

     i have nothing but the utmost respect and admiration for parallel parking, and the parallel parking community

1.24.18  2:47 am   "what are your thoughts on ___?" is a nice format for making questions sometimes.

     but what if it's something the person doesn't really think about
